summary: This document is a property record search result from the New York City Register's office for 9 East 71st Street, Manhattan. It shows a history of deeds, mortgages, and other transactions related to the property, including a 2011 deed to NINE EAST 71ST STREET CORPORATION.

events.title: Deed transfer to NINE EAST 71ST STREET CORPORATION
events.description: Property at 9 East 71st Street was transferred to NINE EAST 71ST STREET CORPORATION via a deed recorded on 12/23/2011.

events.title: Deed transfer from BIRCH WATHEN SCHOOL INC to NINE EAST 71ST ST CORP
events.description: Property at 9 East 71st Street was transferred from BIRCH WATHEN SCHOOL INC to NINE EAST 71ST STREET CORPORATION via a deed recorded on 9/6/1989.

events.title: Satisfaction of mortgage involving BIRCH WATHEN SCHOOL INC and ST. CLARE'S HOSPITAL
events.description: A mortgage satisfaction was recorded, indicating a loan involving BIRCH WATHEN SCHOOL INC and ST. CLARE'S HOSPITAL was paid off.

events.title: Agreement and mortgage assignment involving MANUFACTURERS HAN TRCO and BIRCH WATHEN SCHOOL INC
events.description: An agreement and mortgage assignment were recorded, showing financial transactions between MANUFACTURERS HAN TRCO and BIRCH WATHEN SCHOOL INC.

events.title: Landmark designation by NYC Landmarks Preservation Commission
events.description: The property at 9 East 71st Street was designated as a landmark by the New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission.

events.title: Mortgage assignment from ST. CLARE'S HOSPITAL to JAGGIN INC
events.description: A mortgage assignment was recorded, transferring a mortgage from ST. CLARE'S HOSPITAL HEALTH CENTER to JAGGIN INC.

keyFacts: The property at 9 East 71st Street in Manhattan has a recorded transaction history dating back to 1975.
A key transaction is the 2011 deed transfer to NINE EAST 71ST STREET CORPORATION, recorded on 12/23/2011.
The property was designated as a landmark by the New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission on July 2, 1982.
The property was previously owned by BIRCH WATHEN SCHOOL INC, with transfers recorded in 1989 and earlier financial dealings in the 1980s.
